PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-10672020-12-14,  ,  JUS,  IRCC,  , 
ActYouth Criminal Justice Act
Citizenship Act
PrecisOrder designating citizenship officers of the Department of Citizenship and Immigration to access youth records in order to 1) allow them to determine whether a citizenship applicant is subject to any of the applicable prohibitions related to criminality outlined in section 22 of the Citizenship Act; and 2) ensure uniform application of the Citizenship Act prohibitions through consistent and objective decision-making based on available information held in the Royal Canadian Mounted Police's (RCMP) youth records database.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
